lead_paragraph: Thursday night’s matches, featuring Serena Williams versus Roberta Vinci and Simona Halep versus Flavia Pennetta, were rescheduled for Friday morning.
snippet: Thursday night’s matches, featuring Serena Williams versus Roberta Vinci and Simona Halep versus Flavia Pennetta, were rescheduled for Friday morning.
